contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Xerém 2.JPG|200px|right|thumb|Xerém]] '''Xerém''' ({{IPA-pt|ʃeˈɾẽj}}) is a neighborhood of Xerém District in the municipality of [[Duque de Caxias]] in the state of [[Rio de Janeiro (state)|Rio de Janeiro]], about 50 km from the city of [[Rio de Janeiro]]. Xerém lies on the slopes of the [[Serra Fluminense]], near [[Petrópolis]]. Within its boundaries are a bus factory (Ciferal Marcopolo), the training camp of [[Fluminense Football Club]], the headquarters of [[Duque de Caxias Futebol Clube|Duque de Caxias FC]] and the football team [[Tigres do Brasil]]. Xerém is known for having one of the most important government agencies in Brazil, [[INMETRO]]. Tourism is a significant factor of the local economy; tourists are drawn by the lush and placid scenery, the nearby waterfalls, and historical sites. Every year Xerém host ''Vaquejada Park Ana Dantas''. Past shows have included artists such as: *[[Ivete Sangalo]] *[[Pixote]] *[[César Menotti e Fabiano]] *[[Rouge (pop group)|Rouge]] *[[Sandy & Junior]] In the district of Xerém at [[Duque de caxias]] is the singer [[Zeca Pagodinho]]. {{RiodeJaneiro-geo-stub}} {{coord|22|35|S|43|18|W|display=title|region:BR_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki}} [[Category:Neighbourhoods of Duque de Caxias]]
